Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38039 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.3.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-38039 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.3.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.3.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-38039
